entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the twins who are eating griffin claw. He is described as projectile-vomiting into a bucket and then beaming with his arms wide to protracted applause.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is the other twin who is eating griffin claw. He is described as projectile-vomiting into a bucket and then beaming with his arms wide to protracted applause.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is watching Fred and George eat griffin claw. He is described as being irritated and finding the sniffs distracting.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is trying to find a rule that says others are not entitled to buy griffin claw. She is described as gritting her teeth in frustration.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is watching Fred and George eat griffin claw along with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: lee
entities.description: Lee is collecting gold along with Fred, George, and presumably others.

relationships.description: Fred and George are twins who are eating griffin claw together. They are described as beaming with their arms wide to protracted applause after finishing.
